title: Ollama
summary: The official CLI and library for running large language models locally with minimal setup; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and more.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; sync & async APIs, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); folders, personas, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, chat, embeddings, tools support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL, streaming, Rails-friendly.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting, listing, pulling models with shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in threads; supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-nuxt
summary: Nuxt 3 full-stack starter with server-side Ollama proxy, chat UI, SSR markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama; supports streaming, chat, embeddings, isolate background workers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client with IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency injection, minimal API sample.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; includes Gradio UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator, OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; mentions, threads, emoji reactions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing with Ollama; inline prompts, templates, vault Q&A.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAI-style endpoints.
